title: New: DannielRadall – To Make You Mine (Feat. Steffaloo)
body:
It seems that everyone wants to work with **[Steffaloo](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Steffaloo/155903334466563?)** at the moment. From her work with **[Chrome Sparks](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9160-new-chrome-sparks-my/ "New: Chrome Sparks – My")**, to her debut collaborative LP under name **[Toy Camera](http://soundcloud.com/toycamera/sets/blissful-youth-ep)** and finally this new release with **[DannielRadall](http://dannielradall.bandcamp.com)**, it very clear that the girl has a voice that inspires people.

The new single from the two artists takes a bold new direction for **Steffaloo**, the heavily 80’s inspired track isn’t perhaps what we know her for, yet it’s a sound she adopts with an exciting level of grace. Soulful and sexy, her voice is shrouded in a silk like level of reverb that utterly seductive to the ear.

The production by **DannielRadall** surrounding the vocals, are joyously mental yet still centered in the stylistic direction. Fuzzy synths and an utterly infectious bass line form the roots of the track, with a funky guitar riff around the hook elevating the track to the levels of hyper activeness, but wonderfully so.

Check out the track, as well as the B-side from CITR fave Sun **Glitters** below.
